page.title: 15HOMELIFE - CALLERS
page.content:
We have lots of people calling at our house during the day; these are some of them. Every morning at 6.30 a.m. the Milkman comes and leaves 2 bottles of milk. Next the Postman comes and leaves at least one letter at 7.30 a.m. The Paperboy comes and leaves the Newspaper at 8 a.m. Then my friend Vicky comes to call for me at 8.40 a.m. for school. Next, the Fishman comes selling fish at 10 a.m.. Then the Royal Mail man comes delivering parcels at 11 a.m.. After, the Window Cleaner comes at 12 Noon. My friend calls after school.
BEDMINSTER DOWN JUNIOR SCHOOL.
